mapper.select: select a.*, case when b.bank_org_id is null then 'Y' else 'N' end as leaf from dmd_bank_inter_org a, (select parent_bank_org_id as bank_org_id from dmd_bank_inter_org group by parent_bank_org_id) b where a.bank_org_id = b.bank_org_id(+) order by display_order desc
select * from bsc_resource order by resource_id
select month_id from dmd_month order by month_id desc
